name: Animal Catch
description:
My submission for the 1-button Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam-2020

In this game, you control a shaman that is trying to return to his village, but he needs the help of the forest animals. By catching them, he can absorb their abilities and traverse the forest.

Cat: Runs from the shaman, and when captured, gives the player a movement boost, allowing them to move an extra space.

Buffalo: Detects the player in an infinite horizontal and vertical area, and tries to run over him. Can only be catched from the sides, or the back. When captured, allows the player to move boulders that stand in his way.

Controls:

Mouse/Space Bar/Enter - moves the player.

R - reloads the level.
